items.sentence: Tom didn\'t come right out and say so, but he implied that I wasn\'t telling the truth.
He can't tell a cherry tree from a plum tree, but he can name them in twelve languages.
The Tokyo Skytree is the second tallest structure in the world, after the Burj Khalifa.
The Narita Express will take you directly to Tokyo Station in approximately 90 minutes.
I have a brother and a sister. My brother lives in Tokyo and my sister lives in Nagano.
